pageProduct.name: Swisse Chlorophyll Spearmint 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Chlorophyll is a naturally flavoured, great-tasting green superfood. A natural source of antioxidants, it can be enjoyed daily or as part of a healthy detox program.

Nature’s Great Superfood: Chlorophyll is a powerful green pigment found in plants, responsible for absorbing and transforming energy from the sun.

Antioxidant: Chlorophyll is a natural source of antioxidants. Antioxidants help protect cells from free radical damage.

Naturally Flavoured: Swisse Chlorophyll is great tasting and refreshing, with a natural spearmint flavour.

Size: 500mL

Ingredients

Purified Water, Glycerin, Chlorophyll Dry Extract (2%), Citric Acid Anhydrous, Malic Acid, Preservatives (Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate), Natural Flavour (Spearmint Oil), Sucralose.

Contains: Wheat and Gluten.

Allergen Contains: Gluten| Wheat

Directions

ADULT SERVE:

1-3 teaspoons (5-15 mL) in the morning, preferably before food.
Can be diluted in water or juice. Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C. Do not use if cap seal is broken. Refrigerate after opening.
